thread.title: Very, very good team of employees
thread.title_full: Very, very good team of employees - Review of Staybridge Suites Times Square - New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: wdanta
title: Very, very good team of employees
text:
The room very clean with a very good small kitchen. But the best in this hotel is not your infrastructure, the best it's your employees team. Throughout my stay (8 days), all kinds of needs that I or my family had, they did their best to help. I my next travel to NY certainly i will choose this hotel. I recommend Ms Cristal, Mrs Alex and Brad and in special Ms Jessica
Room Tip: ItÂ´s only ask to reception, the people are wonderful See more room tips
